---
title: "Genomic Data Clustering"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cluster)

# Simulate genomic expression data
set.seed(42)
genomic_data <- matrix(rnorm(200*50), nrow=200, ncol=50)

# K-means clustering
kmeans_result <- kmeans(genomic_data, centers=3)

# Plot cluster counts
table(kmeans_result$cluster)

```
